title: Sample, ca. 1948
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 17 x 22 cm (6 11/16 x 8 11/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Twill weave of mixed cotton and metallic yarns in shades of gray and orange. Warp is three different yarns: boucle, two-ply cotton and two-ply synthetic. Weft is a repeating sequence of gray chenille, flat metallic combined with narrow wrapped metallic yarn, and orange cotton.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, ca. 1948.
ca. 1948. Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: 2/2 twill. Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin. 1972-75-61.
